column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I don't normally leave reviews on yelp
column2: but I thought I should warn anyone considering this restaurant that it will take a sizable chunk of your night. In addition to the upfront wait for a table
column3: it takes them forever to do anything
column4: from serving your food to serving the check. All in all
column8: and it doesn't seem like our experience is atypical.
